string.name: About_Us
string.br: - We basically intend to design a android application named Community4You which gather information about various communities together on a single platform.\n\n
- We hope to address the issue of lack of guidance by providing students with information about the community, such as how to contact them based on their interests and needs.\n\n
- Also, parents can benefit from such an app by easily accessing the right guidance of the field their child demands that they might not have.\n\n

string.name: objective
string.br: - Providing the youth support to achieve their goals according to their skill set and interest.\n\n
- Connecting like minded people via various medium like slack, discord etc.\n\n
- Helping students to better understand their skill set and interest and help them to elaborate it to their parents.\n\n
